channel.title: Ralph Ineson on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ralph Ineson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: From the MCU to Edinburgh: Ralph Ineson on ‘Two Neighbors,’ ‘Fantastic Four’ and Preferring “Less Untamed Aggression” on Female-Directed Sets
item.description: The British star says of Ondine Viñao’s dark comedy: “I don’t think anybody will have had a budget drop from film-to-film as I’ve had with ‘The Fantastic Four’ to ‘Two Neighbors.’”

item.title: From the MCU to Edinburgh: Ralph Ineson on ‘Two Neighbors,’ ‘Fantastic Four’ and Preferring “Less Untamed Aggression” on Female-Directed Sets
item.description: The British star says of Ondine Viñao’s dark comedy: “I don’t think anybody will have had a budget drop from film-to-film as I’ve had with ‘The Fantastic Four’ to ‘Two Neighbors.’”

item.title: How Ralph Ineson Went From a Nameless Pilot in ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ to the Almighty Galactus in ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’
item.description: Working with then-unknown filmmaker Robert Eggers on ‘The Witch’ supercharged the actor’s career, eventually allowing him to play one of the biggest characters in the Marvel mythos.

item.title: How Ralph Ineson Went From a Nameless Pilot in ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ to the Almighty Galactus in ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’
item.description: Working with then-unknown filmmaker Robert Eggers on ‘The Witch’ supercharged the actor’s career, eventually allowing him to play one of the biggest characters in the Marvel mythos.

item.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Review: Pedro Pascal and Vanessa Kirby Lead Appealing New Crew to Break Marvel Property’s Six-Decade Curse
item.description: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Joseph Quinn and Julia Garner also star in Matt Shakman’s superhero adventure, in which the team must save Earth from a “Devourer of Worlds.”

item.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Review: Pedro Pascal and Vanessa Kirby Lead Appealing New Crew to Break Marvel Property’s Six-Decade Curse
item.description: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Joseph Quinn and Julia Garner also star in Matt Shakman’s superhero adventure, in which the team must save Earth from a “Devourer of Worlds.”
